Slade circled her like a shark circling its prey. "Judging from the style of clothes, the chakra stone, and the hair color, I would guess that you're related to Raven, am I right?" he asked. Arella nodded. She considered lying, but couldn't remember why she should. He was such a big...strong man. A real...masterful voice too. "My daughter," she said. "Ah, I see," Slade remarked, pausing in his circling. "Though I doubt you've always been so...hirsuite, shall we say? If so, Raven didn't inherit much from you."

Arella frowned. What did that word mean? ...oh! Hairy! It meant hairy! "Yes...Arella changed," she said eagerly before putting a hand to her head. "Nnngh...head feel...funny. Can't think..." Slade smirked under his mask. This was VERY interesting indeed. What to do with the confused...and rather aluring...woman?

1152222221111111211111121111112212111112.content:
Half-demon or not, Raven had just given birth. Her body ached and she felt incredibly tired. She wanted to sleep for days. It took all her strength to come up with a name for her son. "BB?" she mumbled, hoping her could hear. Her eyelids were heavy.

"Yeah?" he responded, his eyes never leaving his son's face. Raven felt a tug on her lips at this. It wasn't going to be an easy life, raising a baby such as this one...but she somehow knew she'd never trade it in for the world. "I'mma gonna sleep a while. When you c'n, go look on my bookshelf for a tome... Practical Spells for a Practical Life...and leave it here for me, 'kay?" she asked softly.

This got his attention. She hadn't done any magic for months, aside from lifting things with her powers because her big baby filled belly made getting up a chore. "Okay...why?" he asked. She just smiled and laid back, eyes closing. Looks like he'd have to find out later.

1152222221111111211111121111112212111112.content:
The spell she sought was fairly easy to find. It was an infertility curse but it could be cured just as easily as it could be bestowed. It was designed to cripple enemy countries or to cause ruin to rival families. The usual stuff. The spell could only be removed by the one who cast it, but since that was Raven herself, it was a moot point. If she was too dead to remove the curse, she was too dead to have children.

That done, Raven had plenty of time to kill so she kept reading. There were plenty of spells that she could find a use for. Something to increase milk production in case her baby turned out to be ravenous. Given its bloodline, that wouldn't be too shocking. Granted, it was made to be cast on cows...but that should be fine.

There were also some spells for physical enhancements...well, some were spells. Others were curses that could be used for beneficial purposes if tweaked properly. For example, there was a spell that would make exercise several times as effective. This would promote rapid weight loss and muscle development. The only side effect were cravings for odd foods, mostly ones high in protein. Body needs fuel, magically propelled or otherwise.

An example of a curse that she could use was a spell to cause breast or penial growth via food consumption. The more you ate, the bigger you'd get and part of the spell was that you were almost always hungry. Again, easy to remove the curse, so Raven could make use of it. One might not think it to be a curse...but it's only good to a point. Once your breasts are, say, heavier than you yourself are, that could be a problem.

In any case...

Madame Rouge almost felt sorry for the boy. Check that, she DID feel sorry for him. Not enough to back out on the deal, but there was some pity. "Well, I am sure you are hoping to be rescued by your friends," she said to him as she looked at the screen, "but if so, your time grows short. You've just been purchased by the Joker."

Beast Boy could almost FEEL the color rushing from his face. The Joker. Everyone knew who the Joker was. The Clown Prince of Crime. The Mogal of Montebanks. The Ace of Knaves... Lengendary for two things. One was his seemingly inability to die. The other was his near perversity toward violence. One might say it was sexual...if many didn't consider Joker to have no sexual impulses whatsoever. What Joker wanted with Beast Boy was anyone's guess. That he would wind up found dead in an alleyway with a smile on his face...that was less in doubt.

It didn't take very long for the door to be kicked in. Madame Rouge prepared to fight when she saw the red and black garbed female clown step in, holding her fingers like a gun. "Freeze! This is a raid!" Harley Quinn declared before quickly forgetting the whole gag she had just started, lowering her hands and bounding over to Beast Boy. "Awww...! Lookit 'im! He's adorable!" she cooed, patting Beast Boy on the head.

Having little patience for such antics, Madame Rouge crossed her arms. "I trust you have my payment," she said, the threatening nature of the statement evident. Straightening up, Harley yawned and nodded. "Yeah, yeah. Hey, boys! What's keepin' ya?" she shouted. In stepped three henchmen, Larry, Curly, and Moe. Moe had a metal briefcase with him...looked rather heavy, which was a delight to Madame Rouge.

"Here ya go, Rougey," Harley said as Moe forked over the briefcase. "Count'em up if ya don't trust us...though if ya do, I'll have my feelin's hurt." Rolling her eyes, Madame Rouge opened the briefcase.

1252321121121111211211122222221221212222.content:
Beast Boy wasn't sure which was worse. The fear of what the Joker had planned for him or the way Harley was acting. She treated Beast Boy like a combination of a pet and a small child. It wouldn't surprise Beast Boy to learn that was exactly what she saw him as. "Hey, Moe! Crack the window, would ya?" Harley said from her spot next to him. "I think Precious is getting carsick." That was the name she had given him. "Precious". If he wasn't so afraid he was going to die soon, Beast Boy might have made a joke about Gollum from "Lord of the Rings".

The car trip lasted both forever and for a second. Beast Boy's forehead nearly dripped with nervous presperation. "Okkie dokkie, Precious!" Harley cooed as she opened the car door and pushed him out. "Time ta go meet Mista J!" His neck still restricted by the collar and his hands bound, he had no way to escape. Humming, Harley Quinn ushered him into the "Ha-Ha-Happy Co." factory that was currently being used as the Joker's hideout. "Puddin' we're home!" she called as they entered, making Beast Boy wince. Her voice was so piercing!

And there he was. Beast Boy's heart froze in mid-beat before double timing it. Joker's yellowed eyes matched the stain on his wide grin. "Well hey there, sport!" he greeted cheerfully, adjusting his suit as he stepped forward. "Welcome to my humble abode! Any friend of the bird-boys is a welcome hostage...er...guest...here! Heh heh..." Joker put his arm around Beast Boy and led him along. On the outside, the gesture seemed friendly...but the grip on his shoulder was almost painfully tight.

"Have a seat," Joker insisted as he gave Beast Boy a harsh shove onto a chair. "Comfy? Good!" Sitting across from Beast Boy, Joker stared at him a moment, grinning. He seemed to be drinking in the fear Beast Boy felt. "Quick question, because I'm just DYING to know," Joker went on. "Is it easy being green?" Joker burst into hysterical laughter at his own question/joke before wiping his eye. "Well, enough pleasantries. Time to get to business."

1252321121121111211211122222221221212222.content:
The Titans examined the wreckage of the blown up building. "I...believe I have found our kidnapper," Starfire said, her voice choked. The other Titans went to her side to find the distorted remains of Madame Rouge. The heat and force of the explosion had warped her body, leaving her almost a stain on the floor in the most literal sense. There was no doubt the woman was dead.

The other Titans were silent. If Madame Rouge was here and dead...surely Beast Boy was too. It was just a matter of finding his body. Raven left the building and leaned on the wall of another, chest heaving as she tried to calm the turblent wind of emotion inside her. Though her powers were no longer on a hair trigger, this sort of distress could cause problems. Tears trickled down her face. This was all her fault...if she just hadn't read that book...

"Hey, guys!" Raven's heart nearly siezed in her chest. Tori's voice was coming from her communicator. "Guys, I found a clue about Beast Boy!" Robin's soft voice came next. "We're too late. Madame Rouge is dead...I'm sorry, Tori, but..."

Tori didn't let him finish. "She didn't have him anymore! I've managed to trace a bidding, complete with video of Beast Boy bound up and wearing some sort of collar," she said, igniting the flame of hope inside Raven and the rest of her teammates. "Apparently Rouge was trying to sell him off. I've got the buyer listed here. A Mister Joseph Kerr."

Raven's face scrunched up in a frown. Who..? "Shit..." Robin hissed. "What? Do you know this guy?" Tori asked. "It's an alias. Joseph Kerr. Joe Kerr." It didn't need to be explained further then that. They knew who had Beast Boy. And that knowledge chilled them to the bone.

Beast Boy, his wounds mostly healed, soon found Joker returning to his room. "Are you feeling better?" He asked in a mocking tone. "You still look a little..." "Green around the gills?" Beast Boy interrupted, feigning laughter. Joker's smile turned into a scowl and he punched Beast Boy in the face. "How dare you steal a comedian's jokes!" he shouted. Beast Boy got a idea, knowing either he could use it to escape, or anger the Joker into killing him. Either way, he'd be free of this hell. Beast Boy smirked, irritating Joker. "What? What are you laughing at?" "You. You spent all your money on me, when you should have just bought some Hair dye and a tanning bed. I mean come on you look like freaking Cesar Romero." Joker scowled even more, punching Beast Boy in the chest. "What do you have to say now?" Beast Boy caught his breath, then glared at his attacker. "Thank you, sir, may I have another?" Joker grabbed Beast Boy's chin, staring him down. "You have know idea what trouble you're in do you?" "And you have no idea how clammy your hands are." Joker punched him in the face so hard, it knocked the heavy chair over. Joker proceeded to kick him in the side several times. Beast Boy, through the pain, forced himself to laugh, knowing he was driving the mad man even more so. "Stop! Laughing! At me!" The Joker said between kicks. When he finally stopped, Beast Boy stopped laughing. "I think its funny, you have a guy restrained, you're beating him, and you pretend you're a bad-ass." Beast Boy spit out something that he felt was a tooth. "You're just a pussy." Joker reached for the remote, undoing the restraints on the chair. He grabbed Beast Boy and threw him across the room, suddenly realizing what had just happened.
Beast Boy landed on his feet, turned into the Beast and charged at The Joker.

Joker yelped as he was slashed, red blood seeping through the purple suit. Sticking two fingers into his mouth, he whistled sharply. "Bud! Lou! Get in here!" he ordered. This act told the Beast where Joker was and he turned to charge. The sharp cackling behind him made him realize just who "Bud" and "Lou" were. The hyenas leapt at the Beast, bone crunching teeth clamping down.

Burned and with two biting creatures on his arms, the Beast thrashed, trying to throw the animals off. Joker grabbed a hypodermic needle. He wasn't quite sure what was in it...but hey, life was full of surprises! Why not make another? Slamming the needle into the Beast's chest, he emptied the contents just before being backhanded away.

The question was, however, what was it in his system?

He had all the time in the world to play. One man escaping meant nothing to him. Besides, he'd probably find him later.

His thoughts were interrupted by a familiar screech. Raven was coming. Changing into a mouse, he hid. "He's been here!" a voice declared, one that nearly brought Creature back from the edge before the chemicals pumping in his brain stopped it. Tori was here...

Raven looked around, eyes narrowing. "...and he still is. Be on your guard...something is very wrong," she warned. Tori looked at her like she was crazy. "Be on my guard...?" the armored girl snapped. "It's Beast Boy!" Well...that's where she was wrong. First things first though...time to get rid of his double and break Raven's heart at the same time.

Transforming into a cobra, Creature slithered silently toward Changeling. One bite and it would all be over. He'd inject far more poison into him then a normal cobra would. Most of the time, they only inject a little...he'd empty his glands into him!

Before anyone could react, he changed into a large Pterodactyl and flew off. Creature flew off in the dark night in search of Slade. He wasn't going to get a way. He could always come back for Changeling. And Raven. And Tori.

The Titans regathered at the Tower. Joker and Harley Quinn were back in jail, and the Titans East had arrived in town. Raven explained the events of the last couple weeks, starting with Cyborg's transformation into Tori, leading up to what Beast Boy had changed into. As Raven told this part of the story, Tori got up and went to her old room. Bumblebee went after her.
When Tori got there, she took of her armor, dressed in a sports bra and boy shorts. "You make a fine lady," Bumblebee said, joining her in the bedroom. Tori ignored her and sat on the table that serve as her bed and buried in her face in her hands. Bumblebee put her arm around her to comfort her. "Don't worry," she said. Tori started sobbing and Bumblebee held her closer. "That's it, let it all out." After several minutes, Tori stopped crying, and sat up. "Thanks." "No problem." Tori got up and headed to the bathroom, Bumblebee staying in the bedroom. Several minutes later, Bumblebee heard a crash and a scream and she went into the bathroom, finding it empty, a large section of the wall gone.

He grabbed the face of it and yanked it off, revealing a small screen. On it was a bound and gagged Tori. Creature stopped, and stared at the picture, knowing Slade had her. Both parts wanted to kill Slade at this point...but one thought they could wait until a better time. The city was full of victims. Slade could wait until a little later. From that point, he would follow them...watch and, if need be, guide them to his precious Tori. His tongue flicked out. Once he had Tori back, he'd kill the Titans AND Slade then and there. Creature wasn't stopping. Not now, not ever...all Slade did was create a reason to take a break.

Sending the message was easy. Using his old screen name and the computer at the library, Creature sent the picture of Tori to the Main Computer in the Titan Tower. Once they saw it, the hunt for Slade could begin in earnest. Several moments later, the e-mail popped onto the Main Computer.

"Beast Boy. How good of you to join us," Slade said in his mock polite tone. It would have been more convincing if he didn't have a sword to Tori's neck. Tori's attention, however, was on Creature. Her eyes were wide, horrified. Her eyes seemed to burn Creature. He had a sudden impulse to pluck them out to make it stop, but he resisted it.

"Garfield...?" Tori whispered, unable...or perhaps just unwilling...to believe that she was looking at the man she had left the Titans with. Creature hissed, flicking his tongue. "Let her go and I may kill you somewhat quickly," he snarled, ignoring Tori for the time being. It would be easier if he ignored her until later. He had killing to do.

To hell with the woman. She was a part of Beast Boy's life...of Garfield's life. Not Creature's. There was only the Creature now. Nothing from back then mattered.

Yet he couldn't do it...he just couldn't do it. "What do you want from me?" he hissed.

1252321121121111211211122222221221212222.title: Slade forces him to inject himself with an anti...

1252321121121111211211122222221221212222.content:
The needle was undamaged for the most part. The tube still contained the antidote. The needle was a bit crooked, but other then that... Feh...why did he even care? All he had to do is drop it and these pesky thoughts of actually using the stuff would disappear. Creature would remain forever and ever. Just...drop the needle...

Before he could, Tori gripped his wrist. "Garfield...I..." was all she could manage. She was so overcome with emotion. Relief at seeing him alive, horror at what he had become... Before she could say anything more, however, Creature gripped her face. "Not Garfield. Not anymore. I'm the Creature," he hissed, his tongue flicking out. Tori struggled in his grasp. "Gar...you're hurting me!" she whispered, feeling his claws dig into her ebony flesh.

Startled, Creature released his grip. He didn't want to hurt her. Not Tori. Everyone but Tori should be hurt... His thoughts were getting harder to focus on, the venom in his system starting to take a more severe toll. "Just stay here," Creature said. "I need to go kill the others, then we can leave." Tori could only gape at him in disbelief. She couldn't have heard him right! And even if she did, why would he say something like that to her?

"What? Why?" Tori asked quickly, gripping his wrist again. "I don't want you getting hurt," he replied, misunderstanding the question. Shaking her head, Tori felt her eyes watering. What had become of her Garfield? "No! Why do you want to kill the others?" Creature blinked, looking as though he was thinking. "Because...I haven't done it yet," the mad reptilian man answered. He tried to pull away again.

Of course, Tori couldn't allow him to get away. "Garfield, PLEASE! Inject yourself with the antidote! We can go back to the way things were...you and me..." she pleaded. Again, Creature looked at the needle in his hand.

It wasn't long before that soft giggle turned into low moans of pleasure as her ass was once again filled with more cock than she thought possible. He wasn't as hard as before...perhaps not wanting to trigger another bout of growth. ...she wasn't sure if she'd mind that.

132.title: The second Terra story.

choices: Next
Next

133.content:
Years ago, before Killer Croc came to be there was only Waylon Jones, 22 year old ex-circus freak living in a game reserve with his pregnant wife June Jones 19. They were a happy couple even if they did live in a swamp. Waylon was licensed to hunt wild game to be sold to restaurants in the city and June would grow all natural vegetables in their garden and life was good. That was until June died giving birth to their daughter who also suffered from her father's condition that gave him the appearance and similar skills of a croc. Doctors called it Epidermolytic Hyperkeratosis and said that it caused it's victims bodies to go back to a more primitive form. For Waylon it was a curse and a gift, it caused the death of both his wife and his mother who died giving birth to him, it was the object of ridicule and humiliation through out his life, as well as some medical issues. But it had also gave him away to provide for his family. Besides his thick crocodile like skin, it gave him near superhuman strength and stamina, it allowed him to hold his breath under water far longer than a normal human, he could eat anything that came his way especially uncooked meat, his sharp teeth and claws could, and his dark greenish skin color meant he could blend in to almost any environment. This made him a perfect hunter, able to bring down the biggest pray easily with his bare hands which he would the sell for top dollar. But now June was dead and he had a baby girl who also suffered from his cursed.

He sat in his easy chair, Sally in lap sucking on a bottle of formula he was holding, thinking to himself. It was his fault that his wife was dead and his daughter was a freak, just like it was his fault his mother was dead and his father abandon him. And with June dead there was no way he could catch game and raise a child, he should just put Sally up for adoption and kill himself. Just as he was thinking this his daughter burped and then giggled, which in turned made him laugh as well. He looked down at his beautifully little angle that to anyone else would have been a monster even though she was only showing slight signs of her conditions. Who would want her if he killed himself? The local towns people were afraid off them and the only person who would cared about them was a aging priest and he would soon be to old to take care of a child. It was there in his own run down shack of a home that he swore that he would do everything he could to make sure Sally had a better life than he did.

The next week he left his daughter with the local priest and then left for the nearby city of Gotham to get a job. But when he got there Waylon found no one was willing to hire him because he was a freak. No one came out and said it but the message got across, when the person told him "I am afraid Mr. Jones that you simply don't fit what we need." What they really meant was "We don't want a freak! Get out!" He spent weeks trying to find a job, and every day he was meet with more disappointments, and everywhere he went Waylon was ridiculed and mocked. "Hey look out it's Godzilla!" "Someone call the Crocodile Hunter, a gator escaped from the zoo!" With each passing day it got worst, the taunting was becoming unbearable, the inability to find a job made him like a failure, the guilt and grief he felt for his dead wife weighed heavily on his shoulders, but most of all his body ached to see his daughter again. But until he found away to make money he knew he couldn't return.

The final straw came at the end of his first month of job searching. Amazingly he had an interview for a chance to become a police officer. "Finally." Wyalon Jones thought to himself as he walked up the steps to the police station. "A job that is perfect for me! Hunting down bad guys, brining them in, using all my skills to make the city a better place. And people will respect me, no one will ever calm me or Sally a freak ever again. I will be the best police officer Gotham has ever seen! I promise you June, Sally will have a father to be proud of!" With his hopes high Wyalon made his way past all the desks and people that filled the room letting their whispered insults and comments bounce right off his tough skin. "Let them laugh! I will show them." He thought as he walked past.

But by the end of interview his hopes were smashed and for the rest of his life he remembered what the officer who was interviewing him said to him after he sat down. "Mr. Jones I am afraid that you don't have the necessary training to be a police officer." "But Officer Gordon, I have over 4 years of experience tracking wild game and before that I was trained in wrestling both men and crocs!" "I am afraid that tracking men and tracking animals are not the same thing. It also says here you killed a fellow inmate when you were in a detention center for boys when you were 13." "That was self defense! He came at me with a knife and he was 15!" "I am sorry but as impressive as that is we set our standards for police officers very high." "Oh I get it!" Said Waylon who after a month of humiliation, disappointments, false hope, and growing guilt was ready to blow. "You just don't like the idea of having a freak like me on the team. I thought the great Officer Gordon, partner of Batman, fighter of corruption, the only good cop left in this rat hole would be more open minded! But hey I guess your just like every other fucking asshole in this shit town! You know what!? It's your loss, if you don't want the best big game hunter in a hounded miles on the force, a man who takes down full grown moose by snapping their necks with his bear hands just because he has bad skin, well you got you wish! See you in hell Officer Gordon!" And with that the 8ft tall croc man stormed out.

Later that night Wyalon was sitting in a dirty old bar in the slums trying to drown his sorrows in cheap beer. As he sat there in his trench coat and hat, Gordon's words buzzing in his head he thought about all the problems that he faced. He had no more money, no more food, his skin was itchy since he hadn't been able to keep it wet, and worst was that according to Father Bryan Sally may have a cold. Caught in deep thoughts Waylon didn't even notice the two shady looking fellows walk up to him. "Excuse me sir." Said one of the men once they reached were he was sitting. "But me and collage were just wonder if it was true that you yelled at officer Gordon early this morning?" Asked the one that was on his left side. "Maybe. What's it to you?" Waylon roughly. "Well our boss was wondering if you would want a different kind of job were we could use a man of your skills." Guessing what kind of job it was he was about to turn them down, then he looked at the golden locket in his hand which held a picture of his wife and of his daughter and said, "How much will it pay?"
133.title: Death of Killer Croc and the Birth of Lady Croc

choices: The next morning
6 year later
Your choice
1331.content:
That one meeting was the birth of Killer Croc. It started out as a one time thing, but one thing lead to another and soon Waylon Jones had become the thug for higher Killer Croc. He used his wrestling name because it inspired fear and he used that fear to become a legend. Stories of Killer Croc spread through Gotham like wild fire, each telling made them more and more outrages. People began to think that he was a 20 foot tall sewer monster that could jump out of toilets and drag his victims into the sewers to eat, and every crime lord in Gotham wanted to higher him. At first it was tough for him to carry out the different jobs he was asked to do, but over the years he was able to push the guilt aside and looked at each theft, shake down, and kill like he did when he killed a deer, it was just a matter of survival nothing more. Even when it came to Batman who he faced and lost too many times over the years he never tried to gain revenge.

With all the money he made he was able to higher Sally the best teachers for home school, the best treatment for her condition, any toy she could ever want, a library worth of books. The only thing he wouldn't buy for her was a TV or an internet connection for the computer for fear that she would see his face on the news and find out why he would disappear for long periods of time, or why he would hide and let Father Bryan do all the talking when her teachers, sitters, and doctors were around. But as Sally got older she got more curies about the world out side their swamp, the books and magazines her father brought home were nice but they just made her want to visit those places even more. And she asked her father or Father Bryan about his job and why he would come home with bruises or sometimes he wouldn't come home at all, they would get all quite and would say it was adult stuff.

After 10 years of crime and blood shed Waylon Jones had enough. It was on Sally's tenth birthday when he reached that decision. He had just escaped yet another battle with the Dark Night and was swimming back through one of the water ways that lead back to their swamp. He couldn't take it any more, he was tired of having to hide from the cops, from fighting Batman and the other superheroes and villains, of having to lie to Sally about his job or why he was gone for months on end when he was imprison. But the worst part was how she would always forgive him and tell him that she knew his job was important. Just weeks ago she told him she figured out his job, she thought he was Batman. The very idea that his own daughter was the Black Knight when in reality he was one of his most dangers foes was too much. That night he was going to his daughter and all the money he had saved up and leave Gotham forever.

But he never got the chance. He made it out of the drain pipe and swam to the clearing that his cabin was in. When he saw that the lights were still on he smiled, he may have missed a few things in his daughter's life but he had never missed a single birth day. He began walking to the cabin when all of a sudden Batman fell from the trees behind him and "Halt!" in his ice cold voice. Normally Waylon would try and kill the Bat on sight, but not here, not in front of his daughter. Here he was Waylon Jones, Sally's father and hero, not the legendary Killer Croc. So instead he throw him self to Batman's feet begging him to show mercery. This was the last thing Batman expected to see from one of his most cunning and skilled foes. Bats always suspected that Croc was not the monster every thought he was, after all the only people he ever killed were ether crime bosses that he was paid too, or people that attacked him first. Yet he also knew Croc was a cunning and ruthless foe who could appear and disappear in ways similar to the Dark Knight, the only reason he was able to track Croc down was that for once he was able to get a tracer on his harden skin.

But nearly all of his doubts about Croc's honesty went away when he saw what appeared to be a scared ten year old girl peering out from behind a door at her father battered and bruised begging for mercy. He looked down at Croc and said, "I will let you go but on one condition. Tomorrow Gordon will come to pick you up and drive you to the police station. There you will tell him everything you know about your employers and then you and your daughter disappear. Forever! Understand?" "Yes Batman. Thank you!" Said the desperate father.

And with that the Dark Knight disappeared into the shadows and Waylon walked to his cabin were his little girl was waiting. And when she asked her father who was that he turned to her and said "A good enemy."
1331.title: A good enemy

choices: Croc wins the fight but Sally is kidnapped
Bane kills Croc and kidnaps Sally
13312.content:
Sally Jones had always looked back at that night with the creature she believed to be Batman, even though her father would never admit it, as a start of a new life. She didn't know what Batman would want with her father, it must have had something to do with his mysteries job. But what ever it was things changed for the father and daughter, because the next morning a police car drove up with the man she knew from the newspapers to be Commissioner Gordon. And when Sally asked her father what he was doing there he told her that he was just helping the police stop some bad guys. But she didn't no if she believed him because of the angry look Gordon gave him as he got into the car. He then drove away with her father who didn't return until night time.

The next morning he told her to go pack and that they leaving because he had gotten a new job. She was amazed at this because her father almost never let her left their massive swamp and the forest around it and it scared her as well as excited her. She sat on the suit case on her bed and said to her father "Daddy I will only leave on two conditions. First you tell me what this new job is. And second you must promise me you will never leave me again!" Waylon looked kindly at his croc like daughter who reminded him so much of her mother. He then got his massive body on one knee and then looking at his little girl who had her mother's green eyes and dark red hair and said "Sally I promise you I will never leave you again. And as for my new job Bruce Wayne offered me the spot as the care taker for one of his private wild life reserves outside of Jump City." Here this Sally throw her arms around her father, crying tears of happiness.

The move to her new home was the start of a whole new life for her, her father, and Father Bryan who came with them. Once there both of the men seemed happier, like some great weight was lifted off their shoulders. Her father even got them cable TV and an internet connection for the house, and she even got to go to the local school. At first the other students picked on her because of her looks but she soon earned some friends after she beat up a bully twice her size. And once more life was good for Wyalon Jones and his family.

That was until one night 6 years later. Sally was doing her homework when she heard what sounded like cars coming down the dirt high road to their house. She looked out her window and saw three SUVs parked right outside, then she watched something that made her blood run cold. Stepping out of the largest of three was a man that she had only seen in newspapers. Bane.

Not knowing what was going on she was getting ready to and fight the intruders when her father came running into her room. "Dad what the hell is Bane doing here?" "Sally I promise I will tell you everything latter but first you must take Father Bryan and run into the woods." "WHAT?!" "SHHHH!" Sally then lowered her voice to a whisper as her father lead her down the stares to the back door. "Dad there is no way I am letting you face Bane alone!" "Sally I don't have time for this! Father Bryan needs you now, he is 95 years old and needs you to protect him from those thugs." "Fine! But after this I want real answers Dad!" "And I will give them! For now just run!" And with that Waylon pushed his stubborn 16 year old daughter out the door were the ancient priest was waiting.

Sally then led the aging priest up the hill behind their house were they were able to hide in the undergrowth. Father Bryan tried to make the young woman leave but Sally refused to move. She watched as her father walked out of the house unarmed, and all of Bane's men had their guns pointed at him. Bane laughed at this and waved to his men to lower their weapons, then said in his thick Mexican accent "I see you got my message Killer Croc! I knew threatening your daughter would get you to face me old enemy!" "I am still shocked that you cared for me so much that after 6 years you would track me down!" Her father in his monster like voice taunted back. "The last time you and I fought not only did you almost kill me, you called me a lier for claiming to be the strongest man in Gotham! Then you sold me out to the Bat!" Bane called back. "You know Bane if I remember right I said that it was the Venom that strong and you just stoled the credit! And I still know that to be true!" Her father fired back. "For a man who is about to die you should be begging more!" Yelled Bane. "The only differences would be I would die on my knees." "And now you will die in the mud!" And with that Bane charge at his old rival, getting larger with every steep as the venom pumped into his blood. Killer Croc was able to get out of the way just in time as Bane went crashing into their house. Not believing he was dead, despite the gapping hole in his house Killer Croc grabbed a piece of wood that had landed near his feet and charged into the ruins. Using the plank he beat the much larger man in the head over and over until the giant knocked him out of the house and into one of the SUVs. Thanks to his thick bones and skin, Killer Croc was able to survive the blow which would have left other men crippled or even dead.

Dazed but not out Killer Croc got back to his feet as he got read for Banes next attack. Bane came flying out of the wreckage, his face blooded from were her father had hit him with the plank. Sally then watched as Bane came running at her father like freight train. Croc had just come to his sencess when Bane throw a massive punch, luckily he had just got out of the way and so all Bane got was a fist full of glass as he punched the SUV's window. Seeing that his opponent was now stuck, Killer Croc did his most famous move. He jumped on the giant's back and bit him on the shoulder. Hard. Even though he couldn't get his mouth around the entire shoulder, Killer Croc with his knife like teeth was still able to draw a great deal of blood and make Bane scream in agony.

While unsure of why all of this was happening on Laura silently cheered for her father as he fault bravely to defend his home and family from the intruder.
13312.title: 6 year later

choices: At Bane's hide
Your choice
133122.content:
At first the fight went well for Killer Croc, he was able score many direct and painfully hits on his larger and stronger enemy and may have even won the fight if he hadn't slipped in the mud. Bane stood over his fallen foe and placed one massive foot on his chest and says "And now you will die in the mud, old enemy!" And with that he lifted his foot high in the air then he sent it falling back down to the ground crushing Croc's body whose last living thought was, "I am sorry honey."

As Sally watch her father be smashed by Bane's massive boot she tried to scream but never got the chance because as soon as she opened her mouth a pair of rough hands covered it and tried to hold her down. She struggled and fought but every time she brought down one of her attacks another one appeared. Her range was increased even more when one of the thugs knocked Father Bryan down the hill and apparently killed him when he tried to help her.

Soon they had the croc girl tied up and placed a gag in her mouth so she would stop biting them. They then dragged her down the hill were Bane was waiting, stilling trying to get the gunk that was once Waylon Jones off his shoe. "Hey boss!" One of the thugs called out. "Look who we found sneaking around the woods!"

They dragged their prize to feet of the giant who murdered her father. Bane then picked her up with one hand and said "Here you are. The true reason I came to this hell hole. Your father's death was just to good to miss. Now my little deomestico (Spanish for pet) we have important work to do tonight." He then roughly pushed her into the car and after reducing his venom intake so he could fit in Bane got in with her and cars drove away.

On the way back to Bane's hide out he forced the teenage croc girl to rest her head in his lap while he told her his plan for her. "You see my little deomestico I have always wanted to see what would happen if I used my venom on your father's primitive body. I know that your condition gives the two of you a more primitive form and that made me wonder what would happen if I gave one of you Venom. I tried it with other freaks like you but none were able to survive because of they weren't strong enough." As he talked he stroke her head gently like he would a pet.

"So I started looking for Killer Croc, the second strongest man in Gotham. And to my surprise I find he has a daughter who is not only younger, but is even more of a freak then he was. So you could say I got my cake and eat it to, for I got to kill the man who nearly killed me and sold me out to the Bat as well as you to turn into my deomestico."

Here what he had planned for her, Sally couldn't help but cry silently wishing her father would come and kill Bane like he did with the monsters under her bed when she was little.
133122.title: Bane kills Croc and kidnaps Sally

choices: With a happy orange girl looking down on her
In front of the Titan Tower
1331221.content:
Once they got to Bane's hideout (an chemistry lab that he owned under a false name) his men dragged the 6'1/2" ft tall croc girl out of the SUV and into a large room with lots mad scientist stuff, including a super computer, a steel dissection table complete with metal straps, a bunch of tubes wires, and a large glass tank of what Sally guesses to be venom. The men who were bringing her inside strapped her on the table and then began attaching the different wires and plugs into her skin. She tried not to cry as they inserted the equipment into her blood through her tough leather skin.

Once it was done Bane walked over to admire his total victory over his rival. He then began to gloat, "I bet you have no idea why all this is happening,do you my little deomestico? I know he never told you about his last job was before he worked for Bruce Wayne. You see little deomestico your father was once the infamies Killer Croc, one of Gotham's greatest criminals. They say to get rid of evidence he would eat his victims while they were still alive and screaming, others say he just liked the taste of human flesh."

Sally refused to believe what she was hearing, her father was not a man eating monster. He was the guy that taught her how to hunt live pray with her bare hands, the man that would chase the monsters from under her bed, the guy that took the first thing she ever caught, a tinny little squirrel barley big enough to eat and treated it like the greatest trophy ever. He was the man that refused to eat processed meat because he could taste the pain animals and the cages that they lived in. He was Wyalon Jones, father, hunter, teacher, nature lover, not some cannibal mad man called Killer Croc. If it wasn't for her gag and restraints she would be screaming at her captive as she ripped him a third hole, but for now all she could do was stare at him menacingly and growl.

Bane laughed at this and said, "Is my little deomestic angry with her master? Don't worry soon you will be all better." And with that he hit a switch and the Venom entered Sally's body. It felt good, really good, like pure power was now coursing through her body. The pleasure was intense she couldn't think strait or understand what was going on around her, but she was torn over this new power. Yes it felt good and she knew with it she could have her revenge on Bane, but it also felt wrong, unnatural, any victory she had using this wouldn't be hers it would be the Venom. Using such power was against everything her father taught her about nature and human place in it. But right now it felt to good to pass up, so she accepted it, she let flow through her body. Changing her in ways her brain couldn't understand right then. Then everything went dark.

The next thing she new she was lying down...
1331221.title: At Bane's hideout

choices: Robin decided to talk with her
Father Bryan decides to talk with her
13312211.content:
Ever since Bane had learned about Killer Croc and his primitive DNA he had wonder what would happen if he gave Venom to anyone with the same condition. Until he could find away to control them he planned to kill them right away, but all of his subjects had died anyways. At first he thought because none were as strong or as healthy as his rival Killer Croc was since for most people with his condition were often sickly and died young. But the Venom should have at least changed them a little bit before they died.

After weeks of research Bane figured out what was wrong, normal Venom didn't work with primitive DNA because Venom was meant for humans not their ancestors so for those with Croc's condition normal Venom was a poison. Bane spent months trying to rework Venom so it could work with their caveman like body structure.

It took a great deal of time and effort but he was able to do it, he was able to make a whole new kind of Venom that could be used by people with Croc's condition and in the honor of the man who inspired him to make it Bane decided to call it Croc Venom. Their were a few major differences between this and the original Venom. For one the transformation Croc Venom did was linked closely with their emotions and desires, so if they needed to hunt for food it would make them faster and sleeker, if they need to fight it would make them bigger and stronger, and if they were in the move for love, well Bane could have a lot of fun with that. Another difference with Croc Venom was that it made it harder for the user to control their emotions once the transformation started, making them more animal like in mind as well as body, this meant that with a combination of chemicals, mental and verbal stimulation Bane could these monsters and have them completely loyal to him. The third part of this transformation was that if he but in enough Venom into a victim at once they no longer needed to have any more Venom placed into their bodies to control. And if they continued to take it they would be turned into mindless animals that he could easily control. Bane could make an entire army of them and take over the world. Bane could just imagined it, an entire army of these half caveman half animal warriors obeying his every command. Able to adapt to almost any situation, not even the Justice League could stop him.

The only problem was finding good subjects to use Croc Venom on. The condition was very rare and those Bane could find were to weak from the desiease to handle the stress of the transformations. The only person he new that could handle it was Killer Croc himself. Bane was sure that if he could get his hands on Croc he could use his DNA to breed a whole army of his Croc Venom warriors, but Bane doubted that Croc would want to help his arch rival take over the world. Croc was more into making money than world domination. So Bane had only one choice, he had to capture Killer Croc. But that also proved difficult because Croc's skills for disappearing were legendary, beaten only by the Cape Crusader. Hell even when Croc attacked him in his own hideout he still couldn't get a hold on the freak. And then he dissapered completely for six years after he sold out every crime boss in Gotham to Batman and the Police. It took Bane that long just to find him and even then it was by pure luck that he heard a rumor of a croc man and his daughter living out side of Jump City.

When he heard about Croc having a daughter Bane was beyond delighted, even more so when his men brought in a picture of the 16 year old girl. The similarities between her and her father were amazing, the same strong muscular body, the same green leather skin. The only difference was Sally was quite attractive despite her condition. So now he could Kill Croc for revenge with out messing up his plans, and as a added bonus Bane could turn his daughter and her daughters into his only personal sex pets as well as super solders.

And now Bane had her in his clutches, the final part of his plan almost complete. The last of the Croc Venom was just entering her body and then the Teen Titan's would come to rescue her and he could watch as the Venom over took her mind and body, bit by bit. Until she was ready to be his, and then he would use her and her offspring to destroy his enemies and take over the world. And it was all thanks to her old man.

Just minuets ago Robin got a call from Bruce telling him that Bane killed Wyalon Jones and kidnapped his daughter. He was now holding Sally in chemistry lab in Jump City. Robin and the Titans reacted quickly and got to the scene as fast as they could. They battled against Bane and his men for almost 20 minuets until they captured or chased off all of Banes men. They circled around Bane thinking they finally haved them, that was until he fell through a trap door in the floor. Robin thought about chasing him down in the sewers, but he knew that Bane would then just pick them up one by one and besides they had to get Sally back to the Tower and figure out what he was doing to her.

With Sally still asleep when they got back, Robin decided to run some test on her but the results of those test wouldn't finish until the next morning. He thought about staying up to keep an eye on her but Starfire offered to do that instead. Robin agreed that she would probably be able to handle this better than he could so he decided to go to bed.

The next morning he was awoken by a loud scream that could be heard on the other side of the city and fallowed what sounded like a furniture hitting someone's head. Robin ran into the living room which was were they were keeping Sally for the night. The other Titans (besides Starfire) has also gathered there. Inside they saw a naked Sally standing over an unconise Starfire who had huge bump on her head. In Sally's hands was what was left of the coffee table the rest of it was scattered all over the floor. Sally then looked over at the superhero teens and screamed, "Who the fuck are you?! Were the hell am I?! And were the shit is my father?!"

Seeing that Laura wasn't able to remember what happened last night...
13312211.title: Strange Wake Up Call

choices: She goes off hunting
She joins the Titans
133122112.content:
After seeing Bane coming to fight Wyalon Jones Father Bryan used a Bat communicator that was given to him by Batman when they left their old home. He called up Batman and told him what was happening, then when he was knocked down the hill he fact his own death so that he could be there for the girl he came to see as his own. He then called Batman again and told him that Sally was kidnapped. He then stayed at the house and gathered up everything Sally would need to carry out her destiny, what ever that might be. Later the Teen Titans picked him up after they saved Sally.

When they brought the two off them back to the Tower Father Bryan wanted to stay with her but the Titans told him he need to get so sleep, Sally needed him to be a full strength the next morning when she has to deal with her grief. Before he went to the spare room he made them promise they wouldn't do anything stupid when she woke up. Judging by the noise that woke him up the next morning he would guess they broke their promise. "Kids." He muttered to himself as he got his ancient body out of bed.

He walked into the living room to see Sally standing with what was left of a table in her hands, a nocked out superhero at her feet, and a group of teenagers that had no idea what to do next. "I'll ask you one more time!" Sally yelled. "Were the hell..." "Sally!" Yelled Father Brain cutting her off in mid sentence. "We need to talk."

Father Bryan then lead Sally into a private room away from the Titans. Inside he told her everything, starting with what happen last night and ending with how her father became a criminal. The Titans couldn't help but listen to what was happening inside the room but all they could hear was muffled voice and Sally yelling but unable to make out any words.

After an hour Father Bryan came out with a sad look on his face. Starfire rushed over to see if Sally was Ok, completely forgetting that she was the same girl had beaten her with a coffee table only hour ago. "Is friend Sally Ok?" Starfire asked. "Is she still angry with me?" "She is fine Starfire." Answered the elderly priest. "She just needs sometime by her self. She is taking a bath right now as what just happen sinks in. And she was never angry with you, you just scared her is all." "I should go say sorry!" Starfire said in her overly cheerful nieve way. Robin and Father Bryan both blocked the door before Starfire could rush in and yelled "NO!" at the same time. "Sorry Starfire but Sally really just needs some alone time." Said Father Brain before leading Starfire away, while she stared at the door with big puppy dog eyes wishing she could make Sally's life all better with a big huge.

Inside the room Sally Jones sat in the bath tube. The water felt good on her dry leathery skin, normally she would have eyes closed as she relaxed in the water. But every time she tried to close her eyes she saw Bane standing over her dead father laughing. Besides she needed to read this letter that her father had given to Father Bryan so he could give it to her if... something happen to him.

info.brief_description: What happens to the Titans girls? BE? TG? TF? You choose!
info.description:
The girls from Teen Titans begin undergoing certain...changes. These changes can be anything from simple breast expansion to sprouting tentacles on their backs.

There are, of course, SOME rules.

No character deaths.
No vore.
No foot fetish. There are other stories for that.
If GTS is your choice, keep it reasonable. Don't wreck the tower from sheer size.


Other then that, go nuts.
